alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 08 at 3:47AM EST until January 10 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Pasquotank, Camden, Western Currituck, Chowan, Perquimans and Eastern Currituck Counties. In Virginia, Norfolk/Portsmouth and Hampton/Poquoson Counties, and Virginia Beach. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Hampton, Poquoson; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Virginia Beach
